overview: After her raunchy weekend away in Barcelona, we were left wanting to know more about the life of Cherry Kiss, and now we have it as she opens the doors to her mansion and invites us in to see just what happens in the Kiss household when the sexy Alexis Crystal comes to stay. Eager for her arrival, Cherry can’t help but get horny with her husband as they pass the time with an epic anal fuck, but it’s all worth the wait because when Alexis finally arrives, together with Martina Smeraldi, Cherry’s mansion becomes the set piece for a fuck festival like you’ve never seen before. Squirting, fisting, anal, DPs, orgies, and the ultimate climax of this wild gonzo adventure…
title: When Cherry Met Alexis
